item.description:
Looks like one of my fave rock n' roll groups, is playing at T.P.s again, in the "Grand Ballroom".  Free appetizers from 8:30 to 9:30, band starts at 9pm.

Wear a Wildfire t-shirt (if you have one) and you will receive a Gift certificate to some restaurant, (maybe T.P.s??)

Free raffle, win gift certificates, t-shirts, or cash.

You'll have to eat in the dining room and go over to the ballroom after, or just go for the free apps. at 8:30, which I may or may not do, depends if I bring a date ;)  yes, sometimes I do get one of those...lol.

Will do intros until the band comes on...after that, I'm on the dance floor.

no cover charge!!! yippeee

hope to see you there,

susan
item.how_to_find_us: will reserve a table if I have enough people
item.why: great group and a very accommodating venue ;)

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Wildfire at TP's Scoreboard...
